author: Kevin Mejia

text: In the middle of my first 100% playthrough of this.  Absolute masterpiece (coming from someone who has a relatively small tolerance for slow, turn-based games).  While I would love a sequel, I'd be at peace with this game being left alone: It's so complete and satisfying.

text: invock same! Except I lent it to a cousin a while ago. I know he takes good care of games but I would love to have the game back in my hands to revisit it

text: I believe I read that Sega wants to bring back its big franchises to the spotlight, some that have been sleeping for a while. Please give us Skies of Arcadia 2, we need this. Speaking of Dreamcast games, I still can't believe we're actually getting Shenmue 3!
